intake_purpose: Capture recent project work (2026-02-11 through 2026-02-12) for PM agent to update roadmap, PROJECT-MEMORY.json, and archive completed work

tasks: Read this entire file to understand all recent work completed
Update /plans/roadmap.md with all completed phases and tasks
Update PROJECT-MEMORY.json with decisions, challenges, solutions, metrics
Archive completed phases to /plans/completed/ if appropriate
Update task tracking system (mark tasks as completed)
Ensure all agent completions are documented
Capture lessons learned and process improvements
instructions_for_pm.priority: HIGH - Multiple milestones completed, pre-launch status
instructions_for_pm.context: Site approaching launch readiness. Major QA audit completed, critical bugs fixed, content polished. Need comprehensive documentation for case study.

completed_work.name: OG Images Implementation
completed_work.user_contribution: Mike created 7 OG images in Canva
completed_work.description: Created and implemented Open Graph social media preview images for all 7 core pages
deliverables: 7 OG images created by user in /assets/og_images/ (1200x630px)
All images uploaded to Ghost CDN by Alice
Meta tags updated on all 7 pages (homepage, about, resume, projects, 3 case studies)
Tested with Facebook Sharing Debugger - working correctly
challenges: Initial confusion - Alice added meta tags before images existed
Clarified Debbie cannot create images (only specs)
User created images manually in Canva
completed_work.outcome: Professional social media previews now display on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter when site links are shared

completed_work.name: Comprehensive Pre-Launch QA Audit
completed_work.description: Full site audit identifying issues blocking launch

critical_issues: Homepage case studies section empty (theme expects #Case Study tag)
Microsoft job title wrong (Program Manager should be SDET)
high_priority: Missing employment dates (Kabam, Kinoo, 8 Circuit Studios)

completed_work.user_action: Created /RAG-ERRORS-TO-FIX.md for tracking factual errors during site review
completed_work.outcome: Clear prioritized list of issues to address before launch

completed_work.name: Repository Cleanup and Organization
completed_work.description: Organized 189 historical files into structured archive
deliverables: Root directory reduced from ~200 files to 11 essential files

metrics.archive_structure: phase-reports, status-reports, agent-sessions, coordination, scripts-deprecated, activitypub-docs, analytics-docs

completed_work.outcome: Repository professionally organized for launch, all historical work preserved for case studies

completed_work.name: Homepage Critical Issues Investigation
completed_work.description: Investigated empty theme-generated sections on homepage
deliverables: Identified Kyoto theme auto-generates sections from post tags
Provided CSS to hide empty sections (.section-case-study, .section-personal-project, .section-testimonials)

findings.root_cause: Kyoto theme expects posts tagged #Case Study (singular), user's posts tagged #Projects

completed_work.user_decision: Did not apply CSS fix - exploring Ghost settings instead to avoid CSS overrides
completed_work.outcome: User now understands how theme sections work, can make informed decisions

completed_work.name: Resume Page - Microsoft Job Title Fix
completed_work.description: Corrected critical factual error in job title
deliverables: Resume page updated via Ghost Admin API
Job title changed from 'Program Manager' to 'Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)'
completed_work.outcome: Critical factual error corrected, now RAG-verified accurate

completed_work.name: Local LLM Case Study - Add Missing Diagrams
completed_work.description: Added architecture and workflow diagrams to Local LLM case study
deliverables: Updated Local LLM case study page with both diagrams

issue.description: Script ran multiple times, created 3 copies of each image
issue.user_action_required: Manually clean up duplicates in Ghost editor, keep -4.png versions

completed_work.outcome: Missing diagrams added, pending user cleanup of duplicates

completed_work.name: RSS Feed Bug Fix - Writing Page
completed_work.description: Fixed swapped RSS feeds displaying under wrong section headers

problem.description: Both RSS feeds loading into Resilient Tomorrow section
problem.root_cause: Single loadRSSFeed() function found first h4 match for both feeds

solution.approach: Refactored into two separate targeted functions
implementation: loadRTFeed() - finds 'Resilient Tomorrow' H2 first, then searches for 'Recent Articles' h4 within that section only
loadOIFeed() - finds 'Organizational Intelligence' H2 first, then searches for 'Recent Newsletter Issues' h4 within that section only
loadAndDisplayFeed() - shared utility function for RSS fetching

deliverables: Updated JavaScript in page footer code injection
Resilient Tomorrow section now shows RT articles correctly
Organizational Intelligence section now shows OI articles correctly
completed_work.outcome: RSS feeds display correctly under proper headers, bug fixed

completed_work.name: Homepage Routing Configuration
completed_work.description: Configured Ghost routes.yaml to show custom /home/ page at root URL

problem.description: Custom homepage content at /home/ not showing at root URL (/) - theme-generated content appeared instead
problem.user_feedback: Homepage in editor looks great with featured projects, screenshots, etc. But live site shows different content

solution.approach: Updated routes.yaml to route root URL to /home/ page content
solution.configuration: Routes.yaml configured to serve page.home template at / URL

deliverables: routes.yaml updated in Ghost Admin → Settings → Labs
Root URL now serves custom homepage content from /home/ page
Theme-generated homepage replaced with custom content
completed_work.outcome: Custom homepage with featured projects now displays at https://www.mikejones.online/

completed_work.name: Homepage Content Revisions

changes.title: Simplified from long SEO title to just 'Mike Jones'
changes.opening: New headline: 'Building intelligent systems that serve both organizations and communities.'
changes.structure: Featured Work section, NeighborhoodShare project with screenshots maintained

completed_work.outcome: Homepage reflects dual focus: organizational AI implementations + community resilience platforms

completed_work.name: Duplicate and Orphaned Pages Identified
completed_work.description: Discovered duplicate resume pages and orphaned homepage variant

duplicate_resumes.page: Mike Jones' Resume | AI Implementation & PMO Expert
duplicate_resumes.status: CURRENT - has SDET fix from Alice

orphaned_pages.page: Mike Jones - Program Leader & AI Infrastructure Builder
orphaned_pages.status: Published but not linked in navigation
orphaned_pages.note: Old version of homepage or about page from 2026-02-04/05

completed_work.user_action_required: Unpublish or delete duplicate/orphaned pages in Ghost Admin
completed_work.outcome: PENDING - user to clean up in Ghost settings

decisions_made.decision: Do not apply CSS fix for empty homepage sections
decisions_made.rationale: User prefers to manage via Ghost settings rather than CSS overrides
decisions_made.impact: Cleaner approach, avoids maintenance of conflicting CSS

decisions_made.rationale: Allows custom /home/ page content to display at root URL without renaming page
decisions_made.impact: Custom homepage content now visible to visitors

decisions_made.decision: Refactor RSS feed loading to section-specific functions
decisions_made.rationale: Single function caused both feeds to load in first matching section
decisions_made.impact: More reliable, prevents similar bugs in future sections

decisions_made.decision: Track RAG errors separately before batch-fixing
decisions_made.rationale: User completing full site review before correcting RAG entries
decisions_made.impact: More efficient - fix all errors at once vs. one-by-one

decisions_made.decision: Defer Fediverse profile optimization to post-launch
decisions_made.rationale: Ghost 6.18.0 has limited Fediverse controls (just on/off toggle)
decisions_made.impact: Launch not blocked by Fediverse customization

challenges_overcome.problem: Alice added meta tags before images existed, expected Debbie to create images
challenges_overcome.solution: Clarified Debbie creates specs only, user creates actual images. User created all 7 in Canva.

challenges_overcome.challenge: Homepage content not appearing at root URL
challenges_overcome.problem: Theme-generated content at / instead of custom /home/ page content
challenges_overcome.solution: Updated routes.yaml to route root URL to /home/ page
challenges_overcome.lesson: Ghost theme routing can override page content, routes.yaml provides control

challenges_overcome.challenge: RSS feeds swapped on Writing page
challenges_overcome.problem: Single loadRSSFeed() function found first h4 match, both feeds loaded into same section
challenges_overcome.solution: Refactored to section-specific functions that find H2 first, then h4 within that section
challenges_overcome.lesson: DOM selectors need proper scoping to avoid unintended matches

challenges_overcome.problem: Script ran multiple times during testing/debugging
challenges_overcome.solution: Identified in completion report, flagged for user cleanup
challenges_overcome.lesson: Need better idempotency checks for upload scripts

challenges_overcome.problem: User confused why sections appeared/disappeared on homepage
challenges_overcome.solution: Explained theme auto-generates sections from post tags (#Case Study, #Creating, etc.)
challenges_overcome.lesson: Theme documentation and behavior should be documented upfront
